channel.title: Monster Exp Rate Help
channel.description:
I coded a new server and the monster exp rate is so slow dose anyone have an idea how i would change it?
*Gives Slow Attack Exp *Gives Slow Strength Exp *Gives Slow Deffence Exp
I never missed with NPC stuff the closes is auto spawn :/ and NCP Handler
This would be a life saver for me at the moment...

item.title: Monster Exp Rate Help
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

Thanks you very much it worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Monster Exp Rate Help
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

in client.java find public int CombatExpRate and change that to be smaller, which will lower your XP rate

Read full topic
